title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building resilience against ransomware using AWS Backup (STG412)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Backup 构建针对勒索软件的弹性 (STG412)
abstract: To counter evolving cyber threats, organizations must fortify their backup infrastructure for recovery resilience, aligned with NIST CSF 2.0. This session explores three critical pillars: immutability with isolation, integrity validation, and predictable availability. AWS Backup enables these through Vault Lock for tamper-proof backups, restore testing for integrity assurance, and integration with partner solutions for enhanced forensic analysis. Learn how to strengthen accessibility by isolating authentication boundaries to protect recovery mechanisms from compromised credentials. Discover practical strategies to align these pillars with NIST CSF 2.0, ensuring robust recovery resilience and business continuity.
abstract_cn: 为应对不断演变的网络威胁，组织必须加强其备份基础设施以实现恢复韧性，并与 NIST CSF 2.0 保持一致。本次会议探讨三个关键支柱：具有隔离的不可变性、完整性验证和可预测的可用性。AWS Backup 通过 Vault Lock 实现防篡改备份、通过恢复测试确保完整性保证，以及与合作伙伴解决方案集成以增强取证分析来实现这些目标。了解如何通过隔离身份验证边界来加强可访问性，以保护恢复机制免受凭证泄露的影响。探索将这些支柱与 NIST CSF 2.0 保持一致的实用策略，确保强大的恢复韧性和业务连续性。
